alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clay and central Lowndes Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waverly, or 7 miles west of Columbus, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Columbus and Columbus AFB around 330 PM CDT. Steens around 340 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
